title: Consero Identifies the Four Tenets of Finance as a Service (FaaS): A New Standard of Service - Yahoo Finance
content: Consero Identifies the Four Tenets of Finance as a Service (FaaS): A New Standard of Service  Yahoo Finance
description: What is FaaS and how does it differ from other outsourced accounting and finance alternatives? Consero Consero AUSTIN, Texas, Feb. 08, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- With the proliferation of companies selling "Finance as a Service" (FaaS) options, it may seem as if FaaS is merely a new marketing term for outsourced accounting firms. But for Bill Klein, the co-Founder and President of Consero Global, FaaS is a discipline that lives up to four key tenets of client service. Outsourcing accounting and fi
